question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Wetlands?
1) India has totally 27,403 wetlands
2) Inland wetlands are 3,959 and coastal wetlands are 23,444.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: India has a total number of 27,403 wetlands, of which 3,959 are coastal wetlands and 23,444 are inland wetlands. The Wetlands occupy 18.4% of the countryâ€™s area of which 70% are under paddy cultivation.
